string-array.name: enginer_verb_about
string-array.item: This model has an increased rate of fire, but is characterized by a relatively small range of fire.
UZI Pro is a comfortable, highly effective and perfectly balanced gun that will be appreciated by players who prefer an aggressive style of playing as an engineer.
Modification of the classic model of the MP5 submachine gun from Heckler & Koch GmbH
German 9 mm submachine gun, created in the 1960s by a group of engineers from Heckler & Koch GmbH
Universal submachine gun, modification M16A2 with a shortened barrel of 262 mm
Compact and lightweight submachine gun, only slightly larger in size and weight than automatic pistols
The latest submachine gun produced by the Italian company Beretta. The weapon uses a free-bolt automatic and comes with a Picatinny rail
Compact Polish submachine gun, characterized by high accuracy of shooting and allows you to cause serious damage at close range.
Compact submachine gun developed by TSNIITOCHMASH in the mid-1990s by order of the FSB
A Russian submachine gun developed by the Tula Instrument Design Bureau. Thanks to the high rate of fire and high firepower
Universal submachine gun caliber 5. 56x45 mm, developed in the early 90s by the German company Heckler & Koch
The first modern firearm created by the ADD agency and put into production by S& T Daewoo
A shortened automatic rifle based on the Kalashnikov assault rifles of the hundredth series. Uses 9x39 mm subsonic cartridges
A German submachine gun manufactured by Heckler&Koch (H&K). Uses 4.6x30mm caliber cartridges
This 9 mm submachine gun is a modified version of the Steyr AUG assault rifle and is designed for special forces units.
The famous Israeli submachine guns from the Uzi family are used by the police and military in more than 90 countries
9x19 mm submachine gun, developed by a group of specialists under the leadership of Viktor Kalashnikov, the son of the famous designer
A caliber submachine gun .45 ACP, developed by Transformational Defense Industries

string-array.name: enginer_kred_about
string-array.item: Russian submachine gun, developed in 2004 for the special forces unit of the internal troops "Vityaz". It is based on the AKS-74U and is a development of the Bison submachine gun.
Small-sized silent automatic, the latest development of the Kalashnikov concern. Great for close-range combat.
A modular submachine gun from SIG Sauer, which allows you to fire in bursts with a cut-off of four rounds.
A submachine gun developed by the American company Desert Tech Inc and made in the bull-pop layout with a shortened barrel.
Compact weapon with a wide range of options for modification. Thanks to the high rate of fire, it is very effective in close combat.
A compact assault rifle developed in 1998 based on the SG 550 assault rifle. Its barrel and gas tube are shortened to 226 mm.
A 9x19 mm Parabellum submachine gun manufactured by Calico Light Weapons Systems.
A Belgian submachine gun developed by FN Herstal. It is known for its comfortable and ergonomic design.
Export version of the QCW-05 submachine gun, developed by the Chinese corporation Jianshe Industries. Designed for special forces.

string-array.name: enginer_box_about
string-array.item: These weapons were widely used not only by the military and police, but also by members of the mafia.
M4 Custom is an easily modifiable M4A1 carbine based on the M16 rifle.
Israeli automatic rifle. It is based on the AR15 platform, but includes several modifications.
A shortened version of the SCAR machine gun, designed for combat vehicle crews, helicopters and technical specialists.
The latest in the range of weapons from the company Cobalt Kinetics, combining innovation and proven solutions.
A small-sized automatic rifle developed by the Kalashnikov concern as a compact weapon for special forces and army units.
A modification of the Adaptive Combat Rifle ("Adaptive Combat Rifle" or "ACR") developed in the United States to replace the M16.
The LWRC SMG-45 is a modern caliber weapon .45 ASR, designed for American law enforcement agencies. Among the engineer\'s weapons, the SMG-45 stands out for the highest damage in the game
The Micro-Roni submachine gun from the Israeli company CAA Tactical has a beautiful futuristic design
Czech-made submachine gun with a futuristic design and increased penetration
A 9x17 mm submachine gun developed in Czechoslovakia. The weapon is built according to the scheme with a free bolt.
South Korean submachine gun with integrated silencer, first presented at the IDEX Weapons exhibition in 2003. Produced by S&T Daewoo.
Representative of the new generation of folding submachine guns, developed by Magpul Industries in 2008
A compact submachine gun designed for special forces units. It is characterized by high accuracy and reliability even in extreme conditions
The famous submachine gun developed by Heckler&Koch. The weapon is designed according to the scheme with a free bolt
A shortened version of the XM8 submachine gun, designed for close-range combat.
A shortened version of the ACR assault rifle developed as a replacement for the M16 for the US Army
A shortened version of the SCAR machine gun, designed for combat vehicle crews, helicopters and technical specialists.
A submachine gun with a retractable butt and integrated silencer, developed on the basis of the AR-15 as a replacement for the H&K MP5 and similar weapons.
